document_title: Flat warts: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content: Flat warts are caused by four different types of HPV virus (3, 10, 28 and 49), forming smooth papules on the skin. They are flatter and smaller than other warts, and often appear in groups on the hands or face. Flat warts usually go away on their own after a few months or years. (first)
subsection_title: mun coc phang.json. What are flat warts?
subsection_data:
mun coc phang.json. What are flat warts?
Flat warts are caused by four different types of HPV virus (3, 10, 28 and 49), forming smooth papules on the skin. They are flatter and smaller than other warts, and often appear in groups on the hands or face. Flat warts usually go away on their own after a few months or years. (first)
